verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] lay out a plan this month to make good on his promise to lower prescription prices . Drug companies are ready to resist .

[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: lay] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG1: a plan] [ARGM-TMP: this month] [C-ARG1: to make good on his promise to lower prescription prices] . Drug companies are ready to resist .
[ARG0: President Trump] will lay out a plan this month to [V: make] [ARG1: good on his promise to lower prescription prices] . Drug companies are ready to resist .
President Trump will lay out a plan this month to make good on his promise to lower prescription prices . [ARG1: Drug companies] [V: are] [ARG2: ready to resist] .
President Trump will lay out a plan this month to make good on his promise to lower prescription prices . [ARG0: Drug companies] are ready to [V: resist] .
